sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHEFFIELDIA, in botany ; a genus of plants belonging to the class of pentandria, and to the order of monogynia. The corolla is bell-ſhaped ; the filaments are 10, of which every ſecond is barren. The capſule consists of one cell, which has four valves. There is only one ſpecies, the repens.
